A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Loved the visuals\, loved seeing Adrian Edmondson... and that's about it.
Stupid story\, stupid jokes\, no respect to the original cast and legacy\, nothing fleshed out\, just adding more confusion to JJ's stupid mystery box and so much more negative things..
Not a bold and new direction\, only a wrong direction. 
Just give it back to Lucas and call it quits
